DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study examine effect smoking cessation medication alcohol drink . Following 7 day medication pre-treatment achieve steady state level , participant complete laboratory session assess alcohol self-administration behavior cue reactivity session assess reactivity alcohol-related cue . Subjects maintain study medication 4 week laboratory session . The study subdivide three study base subject population . Study 1A enrolls heavy drinking smoker ( test nicotine deprivation ) . Study 1B enrolls heavy drinking smoker ( test nicotine deprivation ) , non-daily smoker , nonsmoker . Study 1C enrolls smoker ( test nicotine deprivation ) nonsmoker meet criterion alcohol use disorder . In Study 1A , volunteer administer either varenicline ( Chantix ) , bupropion ( Zyban ) , placebo . In Studies 1B 1C , volunteer administer either varenicline ( Chantix ) placebo .
DOC.brief_title: Do Treatments Smoking Cessation Affect Alcohol Drinking ? Study 2 : Do Varenicline ( Chantix ) Bupropion ( Zyban ) Change Alcohol Drinking ?
